title: Benefits of Shavasana
text: Shavasana helps relax the nervous system, reduces stress, and improves overall mental calmness.

title: Contraindications of Headstand
text: Headstand should be avoided by people with high blood pressure, neck injuries, glaucoma, or during pregnancy.

title: Beginner Yoga Practices
text: Beginners should start with gentle poses like mountain pose, seated stretches, and controlled breathing.

title: Pranayama Basics
text: Pranayama involves controlled breathing techniques that help regulate energy and calm the mind.

title: Benefits of Surya Namaskar
text: Surya Namaskar is a sequence of yoga postures that improves flexibility, strengthens muscles, enhances blood circulation, supports digestion, and boosts overall physical and mental wellbeing.
